page.title: 12RECREATION IN KIRKBY
page.content: The residents of Kirkby Lonsdale and the surrounding area have a wide selection of{pastimes and recreational activities to choose from.There is an {Art Society}which stages exhibitions of their work in Centre Five and the Library.The local schools also display their art work in the{Library}which is well used in its own right.The{Choral {Society}provides music and the{Amateur {Fellowship Players}perform plays in the Institute.The{South Lakeland Lace {Makers}meet in the Library and offer instruction to any age group,and the {Civic Society}looks after the history of the area.The{Gardening Society organises trips to gardens and talks on that theme.For the younger generation there are{sports clubs}for rugby,football,tennis,badminton and cricket,as well as a bowling club for the older sporting enthusiasts.
